name: Portland metropolitan area, Oregon, United States

agencies.name: Tri-County Metropolitan Transportation District of Oregon

records.notes: A St Johns bound TriMet Route 4 bus was seen at SW 6th Ave & SW Yamhill St in Downtown Portland, followed by a Downtown Portland bound TriMet Route 2 bus and a Parkrose bound TriMet Route 12 bus.
A Tigard bound TriMet Route 12 bus was seen at SW 5th Ave & SW Yamhill St in Downtown Portland.
A Gresham bound TriMet Route 20 bus was seen at W Burnside St & NW 18th Ave in Goose Hollow.
A Beaverton bound TriMet Route 20 bus was seen at W Burnside St & NW 10th Ave in Downtown Portland.
